description:
Akihiko hates company parties and when he refuses to attend one thrown in his honor, Isaki doesn`t hold back on the dirty tricks. He tricks Misaki into going in order to get Akihiko to go. On the way to the party, Misaki ends up helping a man who seems ra
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichido Aru Koto wa Nido Aru
What Happens Once Will Happen Twice
一度あることは二度ある
